name: Solar Junction Corporation
description: Solar Junction Corporation is a cutting-edge company specializing in the development and manufacturing of high-efficiency solar cells. Founded in 2007, Solar Junction has emerged as a leader in the solar energy sector, focusing on innovative technologies that enhance the performance of photovoltaic systems. The company’s patented IVY technology utilizes advanced materials and design to achieve record-breaking efficiencies, making it a preferred choice for solar energy solutions globally. Solar Junction's mission is to drive the adoption of solar energy through high-performance products that reduce the cost of solar power generation. The company collaborates with various partners in research and industry to push the boundaries of solar technology, enabling cleaner and more sustainable energy production. By focusing on both performance and cost-efficiency, Solar Junction aims to accelerate the transition to renewable energy and contribute to a sustainable future.

seo.meta_title: Solar Junction Corporation | High-Efficiency Solar Cells
seo.meta_description: Explore Solar Junction Corporation, a leader in high-efficiency solar cell technology aimed at accelerating the transition to renewable energy.

faq.question: What does Solar Junction specialize in?
faq.answer: Solar Junction specializes in the development and manufacturing of high-efficiency solar cells.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Solar Junction?
faq.answer: Jim McMahon is the CEO of Solar Junction Corporation.

faq.question: Where is Solar Junction headquartered?
faq.answer: Solar Junction is headquartered in San Jose, California, USA.

faq.question: What technology does Solar Junction use?
faq.answer: Solar Junction uses patented IVY technology to create high-performance solar cells.
